data.title: Red Chillies Entertainment
data.meta_description: Red Chillies Entertainment - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Red Chillies Entertainment is an Indian film production company founded in 2002 by Bollywood actor Shahrukh Khan. It has divisions for film production, visual effects, television production, commercials, and owns a stake in the Kolkata Knight Riders cricket team. Red Chillies' most successful films include Om Shanti Om (2007), which became the highest grossing Bollywood film ever at the time, and Ra.One (2011), which was a technological breakthrough for its visual effects.
